{{Terminology Infobox
|type         = Item Groups
}}
'''Weapon Ascension Materials''' are [[materials]] used to ascend [[Weapons]] once they have reached their current maximum level. These materials can be categorized by their visual theme, day of the week, and region they are found in. Higher-rarity materials can also be crafted with [[Alchemy]] by combining lower-rarity materials from the same group.

{{Reset}}
{{Domain Materials by Weekday|Forgery}}
